titles.title: Who Is This That Cometh Up From The Wilderness?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who is this that cometh up from the wilderness?
Who is this that cometh up from the wilderness?
She's leaning on her beloved, leaning on her beloved.
Who is this that cometh up from the wilderness?
She's leaning on her beloved,
Singing I am my beloved's and His desire is towards me.
Singing I am my beloved's and His desire is towards me.
